_header: Sometime there was a noble man
_description: The Seuyn Sages of Rome — in short couplets; ‘B’ text

CULDd117.First Lines:
IN Rome was an EmperourA man of swyth mikil honurAs þe
                    Book tellys vsIs name was de occlicius…
CULDd117.Last Lines:
…To that Ilke blysse bryng vs godeThat neuer in erth ȝed
                    schodde
